oidcIssuer.description: The URI for your compute platform's OIDC issuer

resource.description: The resource ID of the provisioned identity

namespace.description: The namespace to use for the environment.

localId.description: The logical identifier scoped to the owning Radius resource. This is only needed or used when a resource has a dependency relationship. LocalIDs do not have any particular format or meaning beyond being compared to determine dependency relationships.

id.description: The UCP resource ID of the underlying resource.

radiusManaged.description: Determines whether Radius manages the lifecycle of the underlying resource.

values.name: Accepted

Recipe.description: The recipe used to automatically deploy underlying infrastructure for a portable resource

name.description: The name of the recipe within the environment to use

parameters.description: Key/value parameters to pass into the recipe at deployment

RecipeStatus.description: Recipe status at deployment time for a resource.

templateKind.description: TemplateKind is the kind of the recipe template used by the portable resource upon deployment.

templatePath.description: TemplatePath is the path of the recipe consumed by the portable resource upon deployment.

templateVersion.description: TemplateVersion is the version number of the template.

RecipeUpdate.description: The recipe used to automatically deploy underlying infrastructure for a portable resource

name.description: The name of the recipe within the environment to use

parameters.description: Key/value parameters to pass into the recipe at deployment

ResourceProvisioning.description: Specifies how the underlying service/resource is provisioned and managed. Available values are 'recipe', where Radius manages the lifecycle of the resource through a Recipe, and 'manual', where a user manages the resource and provides the values.

values.name: recipe
values.description: The resource lifecycle will be managed by Radius

values.name: manual
values.description: The resource lifecycle will be managed by the user

id.description: Resource id of an existing resource

compute.description: The compute resource associated with the resource.

recipe.description: The recipe data at the time of deployment

RootScopeParameter.name: rootScope
RootScopeParameter.description: The scope in which the resource is present. UCP Scope is /planes/{planeType}/{planeName}/resourceGroup/{resourcegroupID} and Azure resource scope is /subscriptions/{subscriptionID}/resourceGroup/{resourcegroupID}
